title: Manifest V3 Update
body: Updated the Lamden Wallet to use the new Manifest V3 standard.
Also enabled the auth endpoint in the Lamden Vault API.
new_features: Added a new event called 'auth' to the Lamden Vault API. This allows dapps to call the wallet for user login. See documentation for more info.
